## VirtualBaseProps.useIsScrolling property

Determines whether the component should track whether it's being actively scrolled and pass to child items as [VirtualBaseItemProps.isScrolling](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseitemprops.isscrolling.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useIsScrolling?: boolean;
```
